attributes.review: This app made my phone lag and because of that it when I opened the app it stated like radiation something so it gave me radiation which made me get cancer. In conclusion this app gives u cancer period. 🤢
attributes.title: HORRIBLE 😡😡😡

attributes.review: This app not only stole all of my data but it broke my brand new phone and a bunch of racists kept getting my information and were targeting me for being apart of the lgbtq+ community
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: I completely agree with the name of the app!! but i’m a bit bothered by how they didn’t complete its name. maybe if they added “on a gravestone” AFTER the “trump 2020” then i might consider on rating the app 5 stars.
attributes.title: Trump 2020!! 🧚✨

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to hear some news about our “amazing” president, but as soon as i opened it, it started turning on and off my phone flashlight! and to make matters worse, as soon as this started happening, it started sending out electric shocks into my body! it wouldn’t stop until i deleted it! this is why i will never listen to trump!!
attributes.title: ✨𝑙𝑖𝑓𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑡𝑒𝑛𝑖𝑛𝑔✨

attributes.review: Had worst time trying to get app to work, just gave up don’t make no sense at all! None to many bugs please fix
attributes.title: I just give up

attributes.review: Real review here: Never used such a glitchy and disorganized app in my life. Extremely disappointed that THIS is what I should expect from the President of the United States. Not worth my time or yours.
attributes.title: This App is a Joke

attributes.review: This app is horrible they hack ur credit card and steal ur money, talk abt hypocrisy this republican app supports paying less taxes but they steal my money don’t get it bad bad bad !
attributes.title: Only giving it 1 star bc i cant give it zero

attributes.review: Was interested in the app until I found out Trump illegally uses all your person info that you enter. Do not get. At least read the fine print of the disclaimer. 👎🏽
attributes.title: WARNING: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my phone started glitching the f out. I thought I was getting hacked and freaked out. I immediately deleted this app and my phone got better.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
